attributes.action: Stop increase in Trident and MoD’s 50 x increase in nuclear waste to the Clyde.
attributes.additional_details: This would be a breach of the non proliferation treaty and it is directly in opposition to the wishes of the Scottish people.
attributes.background: Stick to non proliferation agreements and do not dump even more nuclear waste into the Clyde.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579991
